Test.Description: This test case exercises the JDWP agent when very big number of event requests for 'METHOD_ENTRY' are sent with suspendPolicy = EVENT_THREAD and with 'ThreadOnly' modifier, which cause very big number of asynchronous events in many threads in debuggee. After all 'METHOD_ENTRY' events are received the test sets requests for 'BREAKPOINT' and 'SINGLE_STEP' events for each thread. Before each thread continues test method to cause expected 'BREAKPOINT' and 'SINGLE_STEP' events the debuggee creates memory stress until OutOfMemory happens. After all 'BREAKPOINT' and 'SINGLE_STEP' events are received all threads are continued and repeated 'SINGLE_STEP' event should be for each thread. The tests expects that all expected 'METHOD_ENTRY', 'BREAKPOINT' and 'SINGLE_STEP' events are received.
